    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_6862ea40861b553ee652684fe1e62611c90d4274</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solvent extraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solvent-Extraktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Extraction par solvants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Extração solvente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Estrazione mediante solvente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλυτική εξαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extracción solvente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the steps in performing solvent extraction using a separating funnel. This method makes use of the difference in solubility of the substances in a mixture to separate its components.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organic liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">separating funnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solvent extraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Jobsteps, 
wenn es Solvent-Extraktion mit einem Scheidetrichter durchführt. 
Diese Methode gebraucht den Unterschied bezüglich der 
Löslichkeit der Substanzen in einer Mischung, um seine Bestandteile 
zu trennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre les étapes en exécutant 
l'extraction par solvants en utilisant une ampoule à décanter. 
Cette méthode se sert de la différence dans la solubilité des
substances dans un mélange pour séparer ses composants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra as etapas em executar a 
extração solvente usando um funil de separação. Este método
emprega a diferença no solubility das substâncias em uma mistura 
para separar seus componentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra i punti nell'effettuazione
dell'estrazione mediante solvente usando un imbuto separatore. 
Questo metodo usa la differenza nella solubilità delle sostanze
in una miscela per separare i relativi componenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τα βήματα στην εκτέλεση 
της διαλυτικής εξαγωγής χρησιμοποιώντας μια χωρίζοντας χοάνη. 
Αυτή η μέθοδος χρησιμοποιεί τη διαφορά στη διαλυτότητα των 
ουσιών σε ένα μίγμα για να χωρίσει τα συστατικά της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra los pasos de progresión en
la ejecución de la extracción solvente usando un embudo de 
separación. Este método hace uso la diferencia en la 
solubilidad de las sustancias en una mezcla para separar sus 
componentes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">organische Flüssigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Scheidetrichter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solvent-Extraktion</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
